graph.coarsening

Class HCoarsener

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.coarsening.HCoarsener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HCoarsenerIEC

    public abstract class HCoarsener
extends java.lang.Object
    analogue of Coarsener class in same package for hyper-graphs. The class if not thread-safe, and must be protected when used in a multi- threaded context.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2015

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      • HCoarsener

        public HCoarsener(HGraph g,
                  int[] partition,
                  java.util.HashMap properties)
        single public constructor.
        Parameters:
        g - HGraph
        partition - int[] describes the partition of the nodes of the fine hgraph (partition[i] must be in {1,...,k} where k is the number of partitions required.
        properties - HashMap

      • reset

        protected void reset()
        resets object's members so that it can be re-used in another coarsening method invocation. Does not reset the _partition data member.
